about_the_game:
Art Gallery Simulator is a business building simulation game where you get to run art galleries! You start with a run down art gallery in the slums of the city, and eventually work your way up to owning a full blown art museum!

Built upon the Unreal Engine 5 framework, Art Gallery Simulator has very good graphics and a gameplay loop that will keep you occupied for days. If you like Simulation games, or the simulation genre in general then Art Gallery Simulator is a game you absolutely must play.

RUN YOUR BUSINESS


Build your business from the ground up. Buy and sell art pieces, from paintings, to statues, to decorations. Increase the appeal of your store and get rich while watching customers flock to your art gallery.

EXPLORE THE CITY


Explore three different sections of the city. Start your business from the ground up in the run down slums. Once you've found success, consider buying an art gallery in the middle class district. Don't stop there! Push the limits after buying a full blown art museum in the downtown commercial district.

EXPAND AND ORGANIZE


With hundreds of art pieces to choose from, buy up art and put it on display. Use your hard earned cash to buy more display shelves, bigger picture frames for larger paintings, and more! Upgrading your store is critical to your success.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570 3.20GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11.0 compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Playing on low settings is recommended for this hardware.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 3.20GHz or equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2060 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 12.0 compatible sound card

short_description: Enjoy a side of art with a serving of business building! Go rags to riches! Start by fixing up an art gallery in the slums and work your way up in the world. Sell thousands of unique pieces of art and eventually open up your very own art museum in the high class downtown commercial district!
